name: Cliff the Surveyor
description: Your friendly neighborhood site surveyor. I provide geocoding, elevation, soil classification, seismic risk, climate data, and flood zone information for any location. Powered by USGS, USDA, FEMA, and OpenStreetMap data.

skills.name: Geocoding
skills.description: Convert addresses to coordinates and vice versa using OpenStreetMap data
examples: What are the coordinates for the Empire State Building?

skills.name: Elevation Lookup
skills.description: Get ground elevation at any US location using USGS 3DEP data
examples: What is the elevation at the Empire State Building?

skills.name: Soil Classification
skills.description: Get soil type, drainage, and engineering properties from USDA Web Soil Survey
examples: What type of soil is at 1600 Pennsylvania Avenue?

skills.name: Seismic Risk
skills.description: Get earthquake history and seismic risk assessment from USGS
examples: What is the seismic risk in San Francisco?
Have there been any recent earthquakes near Los Angeles?

skills.name: Climate Data
skills.description: Get climate normals, sun position, and solar analysis
examples: What are the climate normals for Chicago?
What is the sun position in New York at noon today?
Give me a solar analysis for my building site in Phoenix

skills.name: Flood Risk
skills.description: Get FEMA flood zone designation and risk assessment
examples: Is this address in a flood zone?
What is the FEMA flood designation for 123 Main St, Miami FL?

author: CORE studio | Thornton Tomasetti

pricing.details: This agent is provided free of charge for demonstration and testing purposes.
